## IDeletable interface

The interface for an object that can be deleted.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export interface IDeletable 
```

## Methods

|  Method | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [dispose()](./blockly.ideletable.dispose.md) | Disposes of this object, cleaning up any references or DOM elements. |
|  [isDeletable()](./blockly.ideletable.isdeletable.md) | Get whether this object is deletable or not. |
|  [setDeleteStyle(wouldDelete)](./blockly.ideletable.setdeletestyle.md) | Visually indicates that the object is pending deletion. |
